Html:
Hi,
Is it possible to animate the content of the ModernTab when different Links are clicked?
perhaps fade-out/fade-in when user clicks on another link in the ModernTab control?

dgjohnson wrote:
Hi,
Is it possible to animate the content of the ModernTab when different Links are clicked?
perhaps fade-out/fade-in when user clicks on another link in the ModernTab control?
Hi, by default a "fade/slide by left" - Animation is activated.
If you want an other animation, you can set the Transition-Property in XAML:
    <mui:ModernWindow.Resources>
        <Style TargetType="mui:TransitioningContentControl">
            <Setter Property="Transition" Value="Normal" />
        </Style>
    </mui:ModernWindow.Resources>
DefaultTransition - Fade in/out
Normal - no Animation
UpTransition - up Animation
DownTransition - down Animation
ModernUITransition - Slide/Fade by Left
